name: bmad-mcp-server
description: Model Context Protocol server for BMAD methodology

scripts.build: tsc && chmod +x build/index.js && chmod +x build/cli.js && chmod +x build/cli-tester.js
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && rm -rf node_modules/ package-lock.json
scripts.test: npm run test:clean && vitest run tests/unit tests/integration
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:clean && vitest run --coverage tests/unit tests/integration
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:clean && vitest run tests/unit
scripts.test:integration: npm run test:clean && vitest run tests/integration
scripts.test:e2e: npm run test:clean && AUTO_START_COPILOT=true vitest run tests/e2e
scripts.test:e2e:agents: npm run test:clean && vitest run tests/e2e/copilot-cli-all-agents.test.ts
scripts.test:e2e:workflows: npm run test:clean && vitest run tests/e2e/copilot-cli-workflows.test.ts
scripts.test:e2e:scenarios: npm run test:clean && vitest run tests/e2e/user-scenarios
scripts.test:e2e:quality: npm run test:clean && vitest run tests/e2e/behavior-quality.test.ts
scripts.test:e2e:benchmark: npm run test:clean && vitest run tests/e2e/performance-benchmark.test.ts
scripts.test:regression: npm run test:clean && vitest run tests/e2e/quality-regression.test.ts
scripts.test:performance:regression: npm run test:clean && vitest run tests/e2e/performance-regression.test.ts
scripts.test:manual: npm run test:clean && vitest run tests/manual
scripts.test:manual:examples: npm run test:clean && vitest run tests/manual/examples
scripts.test:manual:llm: npm run test:clean && vitest run tests/manual/llm-evaluated
scripts.test:all: npm run test:clean && npm run test:unit; npm run test:integration
scripts.test:clean: rm -rf test-results/.results/default* test-results/.results/unit* test-results/.results/integration* allure-results/ allure-report/ coverage/
scripts.precommit: npm run lint:fix && npm run format
